channel.title: Need help, Error connecting for other people. PF
channel.description:
Okay guys, Heres my story, I've hosted fine for past 6 months, usally every week I would go into the bedroom and turn off and on the switch, For my wireless G router thus reseting the last 3 digits of my IP.
This time I reset both my Comcast and my Wireless G router, By pressing and holding the reset button..The last 3 digits of my IP changed from .104 to .100 so I changed it in my portforwarding, thanking everything could work.. But now NOBODY can connect, Besides me to 127.0.0.1
I really need help, Highly appreciated.
Msn: Polemie@hotmail.com Or post here please!!
My Question:After I reset them both and portforwarded again, Why can I not host?

item.title: Need help, Error connecting for other people. PF
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

d0wnl0ad:

It’s server related help in my eyes, People can’t connect to my SERVER and I’m asking you why.

yes i once thought that it would be server related to but after arguing with moparscape staff i have come to the agreement that it is not a server related issue and is more of a internet/port issue

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, Error connecting for other people. PF

item.title: Need help, Error connecting for other people. PF
item.dc:creator: @nerdboyxx nerdboyxx
item.description:
@nerdboyxx wrote:

Againt the rules, and dude please dont have a title saying “plz help me zomg need help” or something like that, it makes it hard on the people who are answering know what you are askin before they read the entire topic. And it will get noticed better if you actually post in the subject header your question. There is a sea of “need help” already

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, Error connecting for other people. PF

item.title: Need help, Error connecting for other people. PF
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

have you tried to re-port forward again? you may have messed up when you port forwarded

and yeah it is against the rules to post non server related issues in this section

Read full topic
